diseases.measures:
Regularly monitor the plants for any changes.
Ensure proper irrigation and fertilization.
Maintain proper spacing between plants for air circulation.
Remove any weeds around the plants to reduce competition.

Apply fungicides containing metalaxyl or mefenoxam.
Remove and destroy infected plants and debris.
Avoid overhead irrigation to reduce moisture on leaves.
Rotate crops to prevent reinfection in the following season.

Apply fungicides with active ingredients like chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Remove infected leaves and debris from the soil.
Avoid planting potatoes in the same location for consecutive years.
Ensure proper soil drainage to prevent excessive moisture.
